name: com.pavel_sushkov.curved_linerenderer_utility
description:
Simple tool for making list of Vector3, which will form bezier curves, spirals, springs, cones.
On top of that you can add adjustable noise.
"Line" (or even "path" if you want to use a bunch of Vector3 that way) can be "cutted" with obstacles and auto updated with optional frequency.
Main tool - CurvesUtility. Drop it to GameObject, add LineRenderer if needed and set up parameters.

samples.description: Simple samples of possible line forms
